long_description: Easy-to-spot ?otation for GoPro cameras, the Floaty Backdoor attaches directly to the housing backdoor. It's great for snorkeling, sur?ng, wakeboarding or other activities on or in the water. Includes 2 adhesive anchors and camera tethers for added security in extreme conditions. The GoPro Floaty Backdoor is compatible with all HERO3 and HERO3+ cameras.
